executor.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who deals with the instructions in someone’s will
executor.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a person, lawyer, or bank that deals with the instructions in someone’s WILL (=a document that says who should receive their property after they die)
executor.translation[1].definitions[0].e: His executors hope that the money raised by the painting will pay off the last of his debts.
The major banks now provide insurance, security-dealing, trustee and executor services.
